name: Clutch
description: Clutch ($CLX) is an AI-powered sports prediction and peer-to-peer betting ecosystem where users compete directly instead of playing against a traditional bookmaker. Our platform combines AI simulations, real-time sports data, and blockchain transparency to deliver fair, engaging, and skill-driven betting experiences. Players can create bets, join PvP micro-duels, or use AI agents to predict outcomes across football, basketball, and other major sports.
